SELECT count(*) FROM t_work_orders_master
AND document_number LIKE CONCAT('%',#{documentNumber},'%')
AND memo LIKE CONCAT('%',#{memo},'%')
AND product_idx IN (SELECT idx FROM t_product WHERE name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{productName},'%'))
AND supervisor_id IN (SELECT id FROM t_employee WHERE name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{supervisorName},'%'))
AND work_start_date BETWEEN STR_TO_DATE(CONCAT(#{workStartDate},' 000000'),'%Y-%m-%d%H%i%S') AND STR_TO_DATE(CONCAT(#{workEndDate},' 235959'),'%Y-%m-%d%H%i%S')
AND work_start_date >= STR_TO_DATE(CONCAT(#{workStartDate},' 000000'),'%Y-%m-%d%H%i%S')
AND work_start_date <=STR_TO_DATE(CONCAT(#{workEndDate},' 235959'),'%Y-%m-%d%H%i%S')
AND is_deleted = #{isDeleted}

SELECT
, p.name AS productName , r.name AS recipeMasterName , e.name AS supervisorName FROM t_work_orders_master wo JOIN t_product p ON wo.product_idx = p.idx JOIN t_recipe_master r ON wo.recipe_master_idx = r.idx LEFT JOIN t_employee e ON wo.supervisor_id = e.id
AND wo.document_number LIKE CONCAT('%',#{documentNumber},'%')
AND wo.memo LIKE CONCAT('%',#{memo},'%')
AND wo.product_idx IN (SELECT idx FROM t_product WHERE name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{productName},'%'))
AND wo.supervisor_id IN (SELECT id FROM t_employee WHERE name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{supervisorName},'%'))
AND wo.work_start_date BETWEEN STR_TO_DATE(CONCAT(#{workStartDate},' 000000'),'%Y-%m-%d%H%i%S') AND STR_TO_DATE(CONCAT(#{workEndDate},' 235959'),'%Y-%m-%d%H%i%S')
AND wo.work_start_date >= STR_TO_DATE(CONCAT(#{workStartDate},' 000000'),'%Y-%m-%d%H%i%S')
AND wo.work_end_date <=STR_TO_DATE(CONCAT(#{workEndDate},' 235959'),'%Y-%m-%d%H%i%S')
AND is_deleted = #{isDeleted}
LIMIT #{pageDTO.size} OFFSET #{pageDTO.offset}

SELECT m.idx, m.document_number, m.product_idx, tp.name as product_name, m.recipe_master_idx, m.target_quantity, m.unit, m.work_start_date, m.work_end_date, m.supervisor_id, vmi.name as supervisor_name, vmi.position_name, m.priority, m.status, m.memo AS masterMemo, m.is_deleted FROM t_work_orders_master m LEFT JOIN t_product AS tp ON m.product_idx = tp.idx LEFT JOIN ( SELECT id, name, department_code, department_name, sub_department_code, sub_department_name, position_code, position_name, phone_number FROM v_emp_info ) AS vmi ON m.supervisor_id = vmi.id WHERE m.idx = #{idx}

SELECT twoi.idx, twoi.document_number, twoi.product_lines_idx, tli.name AS product_lines_name, twoi.lines_manager_id, vmi.name AS lines_manager_name, twoi.actual_start_date, twoi.actual_end_date, twoi.produced_quantity, twoi.unit, twoi.status, twoi.memo, twoi.is_deleted FROM t_work_orders_items twoi LEFT JOIN t_work_orders_master twom ON twoi.document_number = twom.document_number LEFT JOIN t_location_info tli ON twoi.product_lines_idx = tli.idx LEFT JOIN ( SELECT id, name, department_code, department_name, sub_department_code, sub_department_name, position_code, position_name, phone_number FROM v_emp_info ) AS vmi ON twoi.lines_manager_id = vmi.id WHERE twom.idx = #{idx}
SELECT product_lines_idx, lines_manager_id, actual_start_date, actual_end_date, status FROM t_work_orders_items WHERE is_deleted = 'N'

WITH emp AS ( SELECT * FROM v_emp_info WHERE is_deleted = 'N' ), code_item AS ( SELECT minor_code, minor_name, description FROM t_commoncode_item WHERE major_code = 'WORK_ORDERS_STATUS' ) SELECT count(*) FROM t_work_orders_items AS woi JOIN t_work_orders_master AS wom ON wom.document_number = woi.document_number JOIN t_location_info AS li ON li.idx = woi.product_lines_idx LEFT JOIN emp AS e1 ON e1.id = woi.lines_manager_id LEFT JOIN emp AS e2 ON e2.id = wom.supervisor_id LEFT JOIN code_item AS ci1 ON ci1.minor_code = woi.status LEFT JOIN code_item AS ci2 ON ci2.minor_code = wom.status
AND woi.document_number = #{documentNumber}
AND woi.status = #{status}
AND li.name like CONCAT('%',#{productLinesName},'%')
AND e1.name like CONCAT('%',#{linesManagerName},'%')
AND woi.actual_start_date BETWEEN STR_TO_DATE(CONCAT(#{actualStartDate}, '000000'), '%Y-%m-%d%H%i%S') AND STR_TO_DATE(CONCAT(#{actualEndDate}, '235959'), '%Y-%m-%d%H%i%S')
AND woi.actual_start_date >= STR_TO_DATE(CONCAT(#{actualStartDate}, '000000'), '%Y-%m-%d%H%i%S')
AND woi.actual_end_date <= STR_TO_DATE(CONCAT(#{actualEndDate}, '235959'), '%Y-%m-%d%H%i%S')
